value.title: StarCraft 2 - Do Zerg B2GM builds work in Grandmaster? (Bronze to GM #11)
value.excerpt: Bronze or Silver Zerg builds shouldn't work in GM right?! WRONG! I made them work in Grandmaster against opponents I normally struggle with. value.title: StarCraft 2: How-to Baneling Bust INTELLIGENTLY! (Guide)
value.excerpt: Baneling Busting is one of the easiest Zerg all-ins in the game. Most Zerg players are aware of this strategy and realise that it works great on the lower part of the ladder in Zerg versus Terran, Zerg versus Protoss and Zerg versus Zerg.   In this video I discuss how to Baneling Bust intelligent instead

value.excerpt: A newbie guide for Starcraft 2 multiplayer! value.title: Starcraft 2 Newbie Guide - 008 - Applying Pressure
